SELECT MEMBER_TEL FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{nickname} AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_TEL, NVL(MEMBER_ADDR, '미작성') MEMBER_ADDR, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') AS ENROLL_DATE FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{email} AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'
